```{r setup, echo=FALSE, results="asis"}
pre = '<div style="position:relative;display: inline-block;">
<iframe width="300" height="200" style="display: inline-block;" src="https://uoepsy.github.io/dapr3/lectures/'
mid = '" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="allowfullscreen"></iframe>
<a href="https://uoepsy.github.io/dapr3/lectures/'
post = '" style="position:absolute; top:0; left:0; display:inline-block; width:300px; height:200px; z-index:5;"></a>
</div>'

files = list.files(".","*.html")
files = files[!grepl("activity|index", tolower(files))]

for(i in files){
  cat(paste0(pre,i,mid,i,post))
}
```
